CmdLine: apk update && apk upgrade && apk add --no-cache     wget     ruby     && echo 'gem: --no-document' > /etc/gemrc
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: java -jar swagger2markup-cli.jar convert     --swaggerInput /in/swagger.y*ml     --outputFile /out/swagger &&     asciidoctor /out/swagger.adoc     --backend html5     --doctype book     -a toc=left     -a toclevels=3     -a numbered=     -a sectlinks=     -a sectanchors=     -a hardbreaks=
Commands.Name: cmd
